biz.ojalgo.finance

Interface MarketView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BusinessObject

    public interface MarketView
extends BusinessObject
    A market view is a an investor/analyst opinion or a computer/system/model forecast in the form of portfolio weights toDefinitionPortfolio() and an estimated return for that portfolio.
    Author:
    apete

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  MarketView.Asset 
      static class  MarketView.Confidence 
      static interface  MarketView.Evaluation 
      static interface  MarketView.Evaluator
      The entity (person/user) that assigns confidence to MarketViews.
      static class  MarketView.Logic 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FinancePortfolio getEvaluatedViewPortfolio()
      A view portfolio that can be used directly with BlackLittermanModel.addView(FinancePortfolio).
      double getMarketViewReturn() 
      FinancePortfolio toDefinitionPortfolio()
      The FinancePortfolio that defines this ModernPortfolio (primarily in terms of portfolio asset weights).
      FinancePortfolio toMarketViewPortfolio()
      The toDefinitionPortfolio() where the expected return has been replaced with getMarketViewReturn().
